name: hal9000
cooked:
Hey there guys, I’m not sure if this is the right section for this post but I thought it’s pretty close.

The KC Open Hardware Society (Group), would love to discuss a way we can become an official OSHWA branch, it would be great to work together on educating the community at large about the benefits of Open Hardware.

Thanks again and keep up the awesome work!
raw:
Hey there guys, I'm not sure if this is the right section for this post but I thought it's pretty close.

The KC Open Hardware Society (Group), would love to discuss a way we can become an official OSHWA branch, it would be great to work together on educating the community at large about the benefits of Open Hardware. 

Thanks again and keep up the awesome work!
